data.description: Perl extension for the C clustering library
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is a Perl wrapper around the C Clustering Library,
    which is an implementation of a set of standard clustering
    algorithms. Recently these algorithms have been applied to the
    analysis of DNA Microarray data. However, these algorithms are not
    specific to biology or bioinformatics.

    Selected section 6 of the module list because several other
    mathematical packages are listed in that section.
